channel.title: Skills, and Reset

item.title: Skills, and Reset
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

[quote=“propabad, post:3, topic:30711”]for the first part you need to set your max level to 200 to do this go on client.java and search 4

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 135; }
Change all the 135’s to 200 and the 300.0 to 400.0, so it should look like this.

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 400.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 200; }
and for the second part what sorce are you using?[/quote]That just changes the max stat level and for the second part it doesnt matter what source your using…

Read full topic

item.title: Skills, and Reset
item.dc:creator: @propabad propabad
item.description:
@propabad wrote:

for the first part you need to set your max level to 200 to do this go on client.java and search 4

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 135; }
Change all the 135’s to 200 and the 300.0 to 400.0, so it should look like this.

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 400.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 200; }
and for the second part what sorce are you using?

stop bumping your thread and for the command here else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noob")) { for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) addSkillXP(-10000000, i); }

item.title: Skills, and Reset
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

1 – How would I get the skills to say 200/200 instead of 200/99 and make them update, so its not like, 45/22 when you advance lvls?
2 – How would I make a command that sets all xp for all skills to 0, without reseting the character (Becuase I dont wanna loose the bank)
